Name: SPS Burn/LOI
checklistText:
NOTE: For burns after insert skip item 1.

1.
	In the CSM Burn Planner create a manuver with a dV of ~3150 and a Phase of 0 in the Retrograde direction.

2.
	V37E 30E
		F V06 N33
	PRO
		F V06 N81
	PRO
		F V06 N42
	PRO
		F V16 N45
		R2 is T- to burn. wait until T- ~10m.
	PRO
		Verify that Panel 13: FDAI 1 & 2 are set to INRTL.
	CAUTION: If either is set to ORB RATE P40 will not work properly 

3.
	Run P52 Opt 1. (or run the P52 Aid: preferred checklist) then come 	       back and do item 4.

4.
	V37E 40E
	PRO
		F V06 N18
		Use V21E, V22E and V23E to set R1, 2 and 3 to +00000.
	PRO
		F V50 N18
	PRO
		F V50 N25

5.
	Set CMC MODE to AUTO
	and if needed use manual translation to aid speeding up the att change.
	Ensure ATT is 0,0,0

	Arm the SPS THRUST Switches.

6.
	PRO
		F V06 N40
			R1 reads T- to burn in seconds
		T- 5s 
			F V99
		PRO
	Wait until the burn is compleate, and be ready to press PRO if something goes wrong.

	Once the burn is compleate press PRO until the DKSY reads P00.

7. 
	Disarm SPS THRUST.
